personal.name: Abhishek Thakur
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: A passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I build scalable applications and create exceptional user experiences.
personal.description: Specialized in JavaScript, React, Next.js, and frontend technologies. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions.

projects.title: Coin Finance
projects.description: A blockchain powered platform aimed at empowering communities while offering financial services. Built on React 18 with web3.js and Wallet connect integrations with Node.js backend structure.

projects.title: Revolvr Retailer
projects.description: A free Shopify app to streamline product consignments from brands to retailers. Built with Shopify Remix scaffold and webhooks for order tracking within Shopify ecosystem.

projects.title: ExpressW
projects.description: An Indrive clone where backend is managed in Node.js with Socket.io for real-time updates and collaborative approach for real-time environments with PayPal and escrow integrations.

projects.title: Collab Head
projects.description: A collaborative site for product teams to directly engage with clients without relying on third parties and directly work on feedback provided by customers. Built on Next.js with Django backend.

projects.title: BlackPatch
projects.description: An iOS app that connects Apple device owners with on-demand repairs, maintenance and diagnostic services. Currently live with 15k+ active users generating revenue around half a million dollars.

journey.title: Full Stack Developer
journey.description: Worked as a JavaScript Developer (Full Stack) building modern web applications.
achievements: Developed multiple projects using React, Next.js, and Firebase
Implemented responsive designs with Tailwind CSS
Worked with animations using GSAP and Three.js
